headline: Charter Communications Looks to Retain Workers With New Stock Program
summary: After a spate of high turnover, the cable giant now offers employees a way to buy stock through payroll deductions, and will match the purchases with stock units that vest over time.

raw.headline: Charter Communications Looks to Retain Workers With New Stock Program
